content: join my fb group to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns join here 1 join my newsletter to learn about new free patterns blog posts and promotions and get a 50% off coupon code for your first purchase join here 2 this beautiful baby blanket is made using the wattle stitch and is a great beginner friendly pattern the blanket can be adjusted to any size and any type of yarn stitches used in this pattern chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet skill level - easy the pattern is written using english u s terminology hooks size needed 4 mm / g the blanket is crocheted dk #3 weight yarn total amount of yarn needed 600ge/1 260m/1 374yds if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2022 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this design are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/6055cb8d4271f096cee0d7c7 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mitered-blanket-square 4 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=726901&u=2493284&m=59159&urllink=www%2eknitpicks%2ecom%2fyarn%2fcotlin%2fc%2f5420162&afftrack=ravelry
